Package com.example.mainscreen

Class Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<Adapter.ViewHolder>
      • com.example.mainscreen.Adapter
  • public class Adapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<Adapter.ViewHolder>
    This class is an adapted that goes binds each restaurant in the database and creates a recycleview for the Homepage. It also creates an onclick listener so each restaurant can be clicked on and brought to the restaurant screen where the corresponding info for the specific restaurant will appear. Each holder represents a restaurant

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Adapter.ViewHolder
      Adds the name of the restaurant to each holder on the homepage
